IDCrawl.name: IDCrawl
IDCrawl.description: Search for a username in popular social networks.

Knowem.name: Knowem
Knowem.description: Search for a username on over 500 popular social networks.

Name Checkup.name: Name Checkup
Name Checkup.description: is a search tool that allows you to check the availability of a given username from all over the social media. In addition, it also allows you to check the availability of a given domain name.

NameKetchup.name: NameKetchup
NameKetchup.description: checks domain name and username in popular social media sites and platforms.

NexFil.name: NexFil
NexFil.description: checks username from almost all social network sites.

Seekr.name: Seekr
Seekr.description: A multi-purpose all in one toolkit for gathering and managing OSINT-Data with a neat web-interface. Can be used for note taking and username checking.

Sherlock.name: Sherlock
Sherlock.description: Search for a username in multiple platforms/websites.

Snoop.name: Snoop
Snoop.description: Search for a nickname on the web (OSINT world)

User Searcher.name: User Searcher
User Searcher.description: User-Searcher is a powerful and free tool to help you search username in 2000+ websites.

Maigret.name: Maigret
Maigret.description: Collect a dossier on a person by username.

Blackbird.name: Blackbird
Blackbird.description: Search a username across over 500+ websites.
